title: RIOD! Rads error IS NOT YET RESOLVED
body: Its not yet resolved RIOT!!! CMON! It's been 3 days already for god's sake! Lots of people including me have tried changing the DNS server and its still not working! Don't just see the comments and say it is resolved if you haven't actually checked it up!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: Shame that the reds don't read these.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=8f4dks6R,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-12T07:27:09.374+0000)
>
> Shame that the reds don't read these.

thats probaly because they dont want lol to get a bad reputation

Oh, the DNS Server change worked like a charm for me :/ 
May I ask what you tried changing the DNS server to? 
Also, some people have said this works: package contents>LoL>rads>projects>lol_patcher>releases>#.#.#.#>deploy>LoLPatcher allows you to open it. Not sure because that didn't work for me, but still, it's worked for others. 

But one more time: by 'changing your DNS server' what do you mean and what did you change it to? 
Also, if you're gaming on a Mac, what version is it?

Most of people that having problem using TPG and I've called TPG. They said it is actually lol's server's problem! Please DO SOMETHING not just posting "We're looking into it" or "We'll keep you posted" but doing nothing. Even that DNS server fix is actually a suggestion from other users and IT DOES NOT WORK FOR EVERYONE.
